westCoord.title: West Bounding Coordinate
westCoord.description: Western-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in longitude.

eastCoord.title: East Bounding Coordinate
eastCoord.description: Eastern-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in longitude.

northCoord.title: North Bounding Coordinate
northCoord.description: Northern-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in latitude.

southCoord.title: South Bounding Coordinate
southCoord.description: Southern-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in latitude.

satellite.title: Satellite
satellite.description: Name of the vehicle or program hosting the instrument. e.g. Landsat, Terra

sensor.title: Sensor
sensor.description: Name of the instrument that captures the scene. e.g. Enhanced Thematic Mapper (ETM), MODIS, ASTER

bands.title: Bands
bands.description: Number of spectral bands captured in a scene

spectralRange.title: Spectral Range
spectralRange.description: Range from the shortest wavelength to the longest

bitDepth.title: Bit Depth
bitDepth.description: Number of bits used for each pixel, E.g. 8bit, 16 bit

spatialRes.title: Spatial Resolution (O)
spatialRes.description: The level of detail of the dataset expressed as equivalent scale or ground distance

refSystem.title: Reference System
refSystem.description: Is used to define the coordinate reference systems (CRS) and coordinate transformations which may be global, regional, national or local in application. This includes EPSG, CRS and other codes

webservIndex.title: Web Service Index
webservIndex.description: The webservice Index  for the maps
